Payment Guide

Introduction

Welcome to Tiazzan Capital! This guide will help you navigate the payment process for our services. Follow the steps below to make your payment and proceed with your chosen service.

Service Pricing and Duration

Select the service you wish to pay for from the dropdown menu. The price and duration will be displayed automatically.

Payment Process Guide

To complete your registration, please follow the steps below:

  • Deposit Payment: Please deposit the displayed amount to the account details provided below.
  • Proof of Payment: After making the payment, save the proof of payment. This will be required to complete your purchase.
  • Complete Registration: Once you have the proof of payment, click the "Proceed To Form" button to finalize your purchase.
